name: get_railway_period_for_utc_date
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool railway_periods.
Tool description: An API to calculate the railway period of a UTC date in milliseconds since epoch (Unix timestamp).
API description: This endpoint will return railway period between:
{"millis":"0","railwayPeriod":"1969-1970 P10"} (01/01/1970 00:00:00)
And
{"millis":"8640000000000","railwayPeriod":"2243-2244 P8"} (17/10/2243 00:00:00)

millis.description: The UTC date in milliseconds since the Unix epoch.
